Methodology

How We Estimate DeepSeek

DeepSeek is uniquely hard to estimate because it's an open-source model deployed across thousands of self-hosted instances. The official API is only a fraction of total usage.

Method 1 â€” Official API: DeepSeek's own API (api.deepseek.com) handles an estimated ~1T tokens/day based on their disclosed server capacity and pricing.

Method 2 â€” Third-party hosting: DeepSeek R1/V3 are among the most popular models on OpenRouter, Together AI, Groq, and Fireworks. Combined third-party API traffic: ~1.5T/day.

Method 3 â€” Self-hosted: DeepSeek models have been downloaded millions of times from HuggingFace. Estimating active self-hosted deployments at ~10,000 instances Ã— avg 500K tokens/day = ~5T/day. This is the largest and most uncertain component.

Total estimate: ~7.5T/day (range: 3-12T)

Key insight: DeepSeek's real impact is not just its own volume â€” R1 catalyzed a price war that made all AI inference cheaper, accelerating total global token consumption by an estimated 20-30%.
